review:
Great . He is very friendly and knowledgeable.  When I got the toothache,  on phone  he has suggested the tab for immediate relief and suggested to visit clinic. 
On visit , he has explained and shown the tooth xray and explain the issue.
After the treatment pain has reduced significantly. 
Thank you Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We did 2 times tooth extraction for my v old   mom. It was awesome as he followed all procedure bp etc and made her relaxed got it stitched after extraction ,medicine everything was v good n perfect treatment.we r v happy for 2 times visit . Will continue next treatment s we hope all will b successful.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Teeth Replacement with Implants in three days,Teeth Whitening,Cracked Teeth,Re-Root Canal Treatment,
review:
Few Days Before I was suffering with teeth pain. I tried everything but it doesn't worked. Finnally one of my friend suggest me budget clinic. He had done his treatment and he was happy with that.  When I visited first time. Dr. Explained me about my teeth issues. It was so critical. I was so worried about cost of treatment. But when I asked them for treatment cost 
it was not so costly. Then I started my treatment and now I am feeling better. Thanks to budget clinic and Dr. Abhijit Sir. Like name the treatment is in budget. üòä

Hi.. this is Reshma Yede! 
I like the way sir treated me and explained my teeth problems also their facilities are good. And the treatment I'm getting is at reasonable price, and my teeth didn't pain much.. it was minor pain during treatment. For me Budget clinic is near to my place so it's convenient to go on time. I would like to recommend Budget clinic to friends and family also.
Thanks !! üëç

review:
** ** *** **** * ******* ** ** **** * ********* No matter how much treatment is critical, treatment will be done without pain and in reasonable rates. Very low cost.
** ******* ***** *** ** *** ****** ** *******.At the time of treatment, you will not know when the treatment has been done. Talking with you ends the work smoothly. Whoever does the treatment, they work not only as a patient, but as a family member.
Doctor's assistant is also good. She fully supports the doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
